data.title: Breaks and activities in Edinburgh
data.meta_description: My Break, My Choice is all about creating opportunitiesÂ for people with a range of different disabilities in Edinburgh to take a break.
data.text:
My Break, My Choice

My Break, My Choice is really all about you. You tell us what you want to do and we do what we can to make it happen.

This could be as simple as going on a trip to the supermarket, to organising a night out, or even a week long holiday.

Breaks that we've arranged have included:

Day trips

Holidays abroad

Shopping trips

Activities

Concerts

Weekends away

More than just a break

My Break, My Choice is also about making sure that everyone has an equal opportunity to lead an independent life. So to make the most of your time with us you'll also have the opportunity to learn new skills like:
